                    name_all: $.info,
                    time: uri.replace(/[#\?].*/, '') + $.info,
                    url: baseUrl.replace(/[#\?].*/, '')
                }])
            baseUrl = url
        }
    }
}
java.put('url', baseUrl);
JSON.stringify($);
</js>$.[*]

    let names = formInner.select("[name]")

        if (value == "" && n.select("option").length > 0) {

        body.push(`${name}=${value}`)
    })
    body = body.join("&")

        if (String(java.getString('.off@text')).match(/å–æ¶ˆåˆ†äº«/)) {
            $ = [{
                name_all: java.getString('.off@text'),
                time: baseUrl.replace(/[#\?].*/g, ''),
                url: baseUrl.replace(/[#\?].*/g, '')
                  }]   }


        //è“å¥äº‘åˆ†ç»„ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡
        else {
            json = [];
            name = java.getString('.user-radio@text||title@text')
            java.getElements('#folder .mlink').forEach(a => {         java.setContent(a);
                json.push({
                    name_all: java.getString('.filename@textNodes'),
                    url: java.getString('a@href'),
                    time: 'ğŸ—‚ï¸ folderã€€ğŸ“‘ ' + (String(java.getString('.filesize@text')) || name)                      })
     })

           java.setContent(src);

            mat = baseUrl.match(/^(.*?\.com)[^##]*\/(.+)$/)
            url = mat[1]
            uri = mat[2]

            function $(reg) {
                return uri.match(reg) ? true : false }

            //getã€pwdã€‘(é“¾æ¥æå–ç )
pwd =
$(/##[^ã€]/) ? uri.match(/##(.*?)(ã€|$)/)[1] : "";
java.put('pwd', String(pwd));

head = { method: "POST",
                params: {
                uri: uri,
img: $(/ã€[^ã€‘]/) ? uri.match(/ã€([^ã€‘]+)/)[1] : "" 
              }}

            //get ã€bodyã€‘
eval(src.match(/var pgs;([\s\S]*?pgs.+;)/)[1]);
eval('$=' + src.match(/data :([\s\S]*?\})/)[1]);
head.body = Object.keys($).map(key => key + "=" + $[key]).join('&');

            //è¡¥å…¨ã€urlã€‘
            url += "/filemoreajax.php," + JSON.stringify(head);

            //ajaxã€‚è·å–è“å¥äº‘ç›˜æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚
            $ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
            $ = json.concat($.text != 0 ? $.text :
              //å¯†ç é”™è¯¯æç¤º
              [{ name_all: $.info,
                time: uri.replace(/[#\?].*/, '') +$.info,
                url: baseUrl.replace(/[#\?].*/, '') }]
                                         )
            baseUrl = url
          }
          //è“å¥äº‘åˆ†ç»„ç»“æŸğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡ğŸ§¡

}
//catch (err)ç»“æŸğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œ

java.put('url', baseUrl);
JSON.stringify($);

    var list = java.getElements('.topic-list-box');
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.h3').text(),
            'time': String(String(list[i].select('.topic-list-item--author').text()).replace(/\s*(.*?)\s*\[(.*?)\]\s*/,'$1/$2') + '/' + String(list[i].select('.tag').text()).replace(/\s+/g,',')).replace(/\/undefined/,''),
            'cover': String(list[i].select('.topic-list-item__cover amp-img').attr('src')).replace(/\?.*$/g,''),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.topic-list-item').attr('href')
        });
    }
} else {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).items;
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].name,
            'time': String(String(list[i].author + '/' + list[i].region_name + '/' + list[i].type_names)).replace(/\/undefined/,''),
            'cover': 'https://static-a.xgcartoon.com/cover/' + list[i].topic_img,
            'url': Get('url') + '/detail/' + list[i].cartoon_id
        });
    }
}
data;

style:
<style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            background: #000;
            height: 100vh;
            font-family: sans-serif;
            touch-action: manipulation;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .player-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
        }

        video {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: contain;
        }

        .controls-container {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.7), transparent);
            padding: 10px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .controls-container.active {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: all;
        }

        .progress-bar {
            width: 100%;
            height: 8px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
            border-radius: 2px;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .progress-filled {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            height: 100%;
            background: #FF0000;
            border-radius: 2px;
            width: 0%;
        }

        .time-display {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            color: white;
            font-size: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .buttons-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .control-btn {
            color: white;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            font-size: 24px;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 5px 15px;
        }

        .center-indicator {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
            color: white;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 5px;
            font-size: 20px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .center-indicator.active {
            opacity: 1;
        }
    </style>
